item.dc:creator: @Dubstep Dubstep
item.description:
@Dubstep wrote:

[quote=“zattion, post:50, topic:346943”]how can i speed up the animation? it is so slow
and the d claws only 2 hits npc and that work
but when i use it on players it hit 4 times but the 2 of the hits always miss plz help?[/quote]

if(j == 6000){ int file = 1919; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] frames = {75,75,62,62,93,93,93,82,82,57,57,71,71,66,66,66,61,92,73,73,65,65,89,89,70,70,81,81,67,67,67,84,59,63,63,99,99,78,69,69,96,96,74,74,74,79,90,90,94,94,58,0}; anims[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1; anims[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; anims[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; anims[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++){ anims[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+FrameStart[file]; anims[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1; anims[j].anIntArray355[i2] = 2; } }

item.title: Project Insanity Full Dragon Claws Setup
item.dc:creator: @PServ123 PServ123
item.description:
@PServ123 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=PServ123 link=topic=443320.msg3348552#msg3348552 date=1285032030]

Everything seems to be working fine, but the special bar won’t show up, I checked everything 3 times and it is exactly as u laid it out.

Here:

case CLAWS_ID:
	c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 2276);
	specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7686);
break;

Add that in ItemAssistant.
Hint: addSpecialBar[color=blue](int weapon)[/color]

Uh, that is definately not it. I had that added already through the guide.

That is definitely how you add special attacks to Project Insanity.

That probably is how you add special, but that not what I am asking. I am saying the special bar does not show up, so I am asking if anybody knew why.
[/quote]It didn’t show up because he didn’t include the case for the special bar, which I just gave.
His ‘tutorial’ never gave the method for adding, because the server he ripped the methods from already had claws set up, so he found all the methods that looked like they were for claws, and posted them.

Though, he didn’t know about adding the special, that’s why he never said it.
So, I will say this again, to add the special bar, go to ItemAssistant, and look for your ‘addSpecialBar(int weapon)’ void.
Inside the switch statement, add the following case;

case CLAWS_ID:
        c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 2276);
        specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7686);
break;

Be sure to correct the constant with the Dragon Claw’s ID.[/quote]
I tried adding it your way, but there was still not spec bar.

Read full topic
